title: Ineos Grenadiers Creates Devo Pipeline in Quest to Stay Competitive in ‘Super Team’ Peloton
content:
Struggling Brit crew partners German Conti team Lotto Kern-Haus PSD Bank in hunt for its next Tour de France winner.

Read the full article at Ineos Grenadiers Creates Devo Pipeline in Quest to Stay Competitive in ‘Super Team’ Peloton on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
